content: And to summarize Assure's greatest opportunities going forward include: number one, expanding our remote neurology services; two, taking full advantage of our position as a contracted provider of interoperative monitoring services, for now some of the largest GPOs in the United States; three, organic growth that extends our reach within existing states, but also helps us expand into new states; four, utilizing data, analytics and automation to strengthen revenue cycle management and to facilitate the signing of new in-network agreements.
